title: I need to choose!
body:
I need to choose between the cold-hearted robot girl, or the heartful, treery tree dude, I must choose! I will buy camille for top and jungle? or Ivern for TOp and Jungle? (note that I am a jungler main, so I am leaning towards Ivern anyways).

http://i.imgur.com/mfSHvnd.jpg
(sorry, it just came to my minde, this picture did...)
